title: How to grow the same size sweet potato - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m interested how to grow same size sweet potato? Last year i’v planted about 10.000 roots, and quite satisfied with results. Problem is that i didn’t get consisted size. There was a lot of huge pieces weighting about 2 kilos or more, and really small size pieces, quite random. I appreciate any help.
They are grown in different sizes. Then the farmer or the distributor sort them by size
